page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content:
This is a rural area 12 miles from the nearest town of Morpeth and includes two villages,Scots Gap and Cambo.It is predominantly a farming area.
Scots Gap is a working village,with a Mart,and service centre for ancillary agricultural activities.It has become the development area for the district and has newer council and private housing as well as older houses.
Cambo is an extension of the local manor hose,with stone houses origanally service cottages and other larger houses origanally housing estate managers.These are set around the village green.
